AppDB.Name: OAM_GENERAL_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configuration for OAM over ethernet packets

Field.Description: This is a bitmap, with the index to every bit being Packet Format Qualifier0 2:0. If the bit is set and PP-Inject is enabled then the packets injection is enabled
Field.Name: EGRESS_PACKET_INJECTED_BITMAP

Field.Description: Map FWD Sterngth to OAM-Injection bit
Field.Name: EGRESS_MAP_STRENGTH_TO_OAM_INJECTION

Field.Description: Sets OAMP Tx App specific Format to JR2
Field.Name: TX_JR2_AS_OAM

Field.Description: In cases of MPLS TP in OAM ID use InLif0 only if larger than this threshold
Field.Name: RIF_ID_THRESHOLD

Field.Description: Type-of-Service value used for BFD single-hop
Field.Name: OAMP_BFD_IPV4_ONE_HOP_TOS

AppDB.Name: OAM_TCAM_IDENTIFICATION_APPDB
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Set OAM TCAM identification APPDB ID

Field.Description: Disable the lm index mapping according to the subtype
Field.Name: OAM_LM_READ_INDEX_DISABLE

Field.Description: Enable the lm index mapping according to the subtype
Field.Name: OAM_LM_READ_INDEX_ENABLE

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_OAM_PROCESS_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping of OAM packet to one several possible OAM processes

AppDB.Name: OAM_TS_HEADER_PER_SUBTYPE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: For each OAM subtype, automatically adds OAM_TS header if set

AppDB.Name: OAM_CHANNEL_TYPE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Maps the CW Channel type to an OAM format

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_OAM_SUB_TYPE_TO_DATA_TYPE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: For each OAM subtype, set data type value for OAM Application Extension(oam_ts_data) (0 - counter-value, 1 - TOD-1588, 2 - NTP, 3 - none)

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_OAM_SUB_TYPE_TO_DATA_TYPE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: For each OAM subtype, set data type value for OAM Application Extension(oam_ts_data) (0 - TOD-1588, 1 - NTP, 2 - counter-value, 3 - none)

AppDB.Name: OAMP_INTERRUPT_DATA
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Interrupt data received from OAMP for indicating RMEP related change information. It contains the RMEP DB address, LOC indication, RDI indication and RMEP state change info

AppDB.Name: OAMP_MDB_APP_DB
AppDB.OneLineDescription: IDs for the MDB Application Databases

Field.Description: ID of MEP DB Application Database
Field.Name: MEP_DB_ID

Field.Description: ID of RMEP DB Application Database
Field.Name: RMEP_DB_ID

Field.Description: ID of MEP DB Application Lookup Database
Field.Name: MEP_LOOKUP_ID

Field.Description: ID of RMEP DB Application Lookup Database
Field.Name: RMEP_LOOKUP_ID

AppDB.Name: OAMP_MEP_TYPE_TRAP_CODE_TCAM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Maps trap code and opcode/channel to MEP type

Field.Description: Opcode or GACH channel for this TCAM
Field.Name: KEY_OPCODE_GACH_CHANNEL

Field.Description: Bitmask for Opcode or GACH channel
Field.Name: KEY_OPCODE_GACH_CHANNEL_MASK

Field.Description: 1 for this entry is valid, 0 otherwise
Field.Name: RESULT_VALID

Field.Description: Rx Mode; 1 - Flexible (Qumran), otherwise Jericho 1 compatible
Field.Name: UDH_MODE

Field.Description: Value of most significant byte of Tx UDH
Field.Name: UDH_TX_DATA

Field.Description: Length of protection packet header, in bytes, 80 max
Field.Name: PROTECTION_PACKET_LEN

Field.Description: input to OAMP-PE TCAM for program selection
Field.Name: PROTECTION_PACKET_EDIT_PROG

Field.Description: Length of protection packet header, in bytes, 80 max
Field.Name: PROTECTION_PACKET_LEN

Field.Description: PE program to use on protection packet header
Field.Name: PROTECTION_PACKET_EDIT_PROG

Field.Description: Length of protection packet header, in bytes, 80 max
Field.Name: PROTECTION_PACKET_LEN

Field.Description: PE program to use on protection packet header
Field.Name: PROTECTION_PACKET_EDIT_PROG

Field.Description: Opcode or GACH channel for this TCAM
Field.Name: OPCODE_GACH_CHANNEL

Field.Description: 1 bit choose CRC1 or CRC2 from extra data
Field.Name: CRC_INDEX

Field.Description: TRUE for this entry is valid, FALSE otherwise
Field.Name: VALID

Field.Description: Bit per bit mask for the first 64 bits
Field.Name: PER_BIT_MASK

Field.Description: Bit per byte mask for the last 120 bytes
Field.Name: PER_BYTE_MASK

Field.Description: Setting priority of the traffic injected by the TX machine
Field.Name: TXM_ARB_WEIGHT

Field.Description: Setting priority of the traffic initiated by the LMR/DMR response machine
Field.Name: SAT_ARB_WEIGHT

Field.Description: Setting priority of the traffic injected by TST/LBM machine.
Field.Name: RSP_ARB_WEIGHT

Field.Description: Select the time code source.0-NSE block 1-TOD block
Field.Name: TODW_SELECT_IEEE_1588_TIMER

Field.Description: Select the time code source.0-NSE block 1-TOD block
Field.Name: TODW_SELECT_NTP_TIMER

Field.Description: NCO Frequency Stepping control Default is 0x2000_0000 based on 500Mhz TimeSync clock
Field.Name: ECI_NSE_NCO_FREQ_CONTROL

Field.Description: Switch mux to select bit 25 or 32 (01/10)of the NTP_OUTPUT counter.
Field.Name: EVENT_MUX_CONTROL

Field.Description: NTP Enable for loading NTP_TIME_FRAC_SEC_LOWER, NTP_TIME_FRAC_SEC_UPPER, NTP_TIME_1_SEC and NTP_TIME_FREQ_CONTROL
Field.Name: LOAD_ENABLE

Field.Description: Value loaded to 32 bit accumulator when TodNtpLoadEnable is asserted
Field.Name: TIME_FRAC_SEC_LOWER

Field.Description: Value loaded to 32 bit accumulator when TodNtpLoadEnable is asserted
Field.Name: TIME_FRAC_SEC_UPPER

Field.Description: Frequency value added to the 32 bit accumulator
Field.Name: TIME_FREQ_CONTROL

Field.Description: TodNtpLoadEnable but effective for a single TimeSync clock cycle
Field.Name: LOAD_ONCE

Field.Description: Switch mux to select bit 25 or 32 (01/10)of the IEEE1588_OUTPUT counter.
Field.Name: EVENT_MUX_CONTROL

Field.Description: NTP Enable for loading 1588_TIME_FRAC_SEC_LOWER, NTP_TIME_FRAC_SEC_UPPER, NTP_TIME_1_SEC and NTP_TIME_FREQ_CONTROL
Field.Name: LOAD_ENABLE

Field.Description: Value loaded to 32 bit accumulator when Tod1588LoadEnable is asserted
Field.Name: TIME_FRAC_SEC_LOWER

Field.Description: Value loaded to 32 bit accumulator when Tod1588LoadEnable is asserted
Field.Name: TIME_FRAC_SEC_UPPER

Field.Description: Frequency value added to the 32 bit accumulator
Field.Name: TIME_FREQ_CONTROL

Field.Description: Tod1588LoadEnable but effective for a single TimeSync clock cycle
Field.Name: LOAD_ONCE

Field.Description: No match from Trap code TCAM
Field.Name: PKT_TRAP_CODE_MATCH

Field.Description: MEP-DB or RMEP-DB hit with parity error(2)
Field.Name: PARITY_ERROR

Field.Description: BFD - Your discriminator not in range(9)
Field.Name: ERR_YOUR_DISC_MISS

Field.Description: Packet arrived with error from egress(1)
Field.Name: ERR_PACKET

Field.Description: BFD - Packet my Discriminator missmatch MEP-DB Your doscriminator(8)
Field.Name: ERR_MY_DISC_MISS
